ntms/vacuum_toroidal_field.documentation: Characteristics of the vacuum toroidal field (used in rho_tor definition)

ntms/vacuum_toroidal_field/r0.documentation: Reference major radius where the vacuum toroidal magnetic field is given (usually a fixed position such as the middle of the vessel at the equatorial midplane)

ntms/vacuum_toroidal_field/b0.documentation: Vacuum toroidal field at R0 [T]; Positive sign means anti-clockwise when viewing from above. The product R0B0 must be consistent with the b_tor_vacuum_r field of the tf IDS.

ntms/time_slice.documentation: Description of neoclassical tearing modes for various time slices

ntms/time_slice/mode.documentation: List of the various NTM modes appearing during the simulation. If a mode appears several times, use several indices in this array of structure with the same m,n values.

ntms/time_slice/mode/onset/width.documentation: Seed island full width at onset time

ntms/time_slice/mode/onset/time_offset.documentation: Offset time (when a mode disappears). If the mode reappears later in the simulation, use another index of the mode array of structure

ntms/time_slice/mode/onset/phase.documentation: Phase of the mode at onset

ntms/time_slice/mode/dwidth_dt.documentation: Time derivative of the full width of the mode

ntms/time_slice/mode/dphase_dt.documentation: Time derivative of the phase of the mode

ntms/time_slice/mode/dfrequency_dt.documentation: Time derivative of the frequency of the mode

ntms/time_slice/mode/deltaw.documentation: deltaw contributions to the Rutherford equation

ntms/time_slice/mode/torque.documentation: torque contributions to the Rutherford equation

ntms/time_slice/mode/calculation_method.documentation: Description of how the mode evolution is calculated

ntms/time_slice/mode/delta_diff.documentation: Extra diffusion coefficient for the transport equations of Te, ne, Ti

ntms/time_slice/mode/rho_tor_norm.documentation: Normalized flux coordinate on which the mode is centred

ntms/time_slice/mode/rho_tor.documentation: Flux coordinate on which the mode is centred

ntms/time_slice/mode/detailed_evolution.documentation: Detailed NTM evolution on a finer timebase than the time_slice array of structure

ntms/time_slice/mode/detailed_evolution/.documentation: Time array used to describe the detailed evolution of the NTM
Time derivative of the full width of the mode
Time derivative of the phase of the mode
Time derivative of the frequency of the mode
deltaw contributions to the Rutherford equation
torque contributions to the Rutherford equation
Description of how the mode evolution is calculated
Extra diffusion coefficient for the transport equations of Te, ne, Ti
